title: New: Day Joy – Florida's Warm
body:
This track from Orlando’s **Day Joy** aka Michael Serrin has soundtracked the biting London mornings for me over the past week or so.

It’s steeped in an admirable sense of romanticism whilst sonically there’s elements of Youth Lagoon and Wild Nothing, perhaps even The Cure. Check out _Florida’s Warm_ below.

_maybe someday / you won’t know me_

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.

Check out Florida’s Warm below. maybe someday / you won’t \[…\]
